## cdk-ghost-string-parameter package

Provides access control over parameters in Parameter Store on AWS Systems Manager.

|  [GhostStringParameter](./cdk-ghost-string-parameter.ghoststringparameter.md) | **_(BETA)_** String parameter stored in Parameter Store on AWS Systems Manager. |
